description: Cynthia`s Spiritomb was revealed during the second semifinal match of the Masters Tournament verses Ash Ketchum. It was removed from battle after defeating Ash`s Dragonite and then came back to finish off Ash`s Gengar. It finally lost to Pikachu but its final move was to use Destiny Bond, causing Pikachu to faint also.
name: Mikaruge (Shirona)
